message.body: Got a bunch more chicken mushrooms if you want some. Might be a little more tender than the last batch
Thanks man! Those were awesome. I made 3 a pot pies last week!
Yeah I made 5 I think. I'm going to try to make chicken mushroom parm sandwich tonight and more potpies tomorrow if I have time.
They're really good in tai style curries too
I bet. I hadn't had them before so it took me a while to brainstorm a recipe.
Just come on by if you want some more. Just battered and fried they are great
Cool thanks! I'm headed to upstate ny early AM but I'll be in touch on tues if there are any left. Thanks!
The maitake are probably fruiting in ny if u see any. Around old growth oak
Ok. I'll keep my eyes pealed.
